text: Zhao Chongyang () is a Chinese kickboxer. He is the current Enfusion 60 kg champion. He was ranked as a top ten flyweight by Combat Press from September 2019, until July 2020. ==Kickboxing career== Zhao participated in the Kunlun Fight 74 8 man tournament. He won the first fight against Saeksan Or. Kwanmuang, but was forced to withdraw from the tournament due to injury. Chongyang fought Leona Pettas during Krush 90. Pettas lost the fight by a second round KO. Zhao fought during Wu Lin Feng: Australia vs China event, with his opponent being Mark Mullan. Zhao won the fight by a third round KO. Chongyang fought against Pietro Doorje for the vacant Enfusion 60 kg title. Chongyang won the fight by a first round knockout. Following a brief pause in kickboxing events during the COVID-19 pandemic, Zhao fought during Wu Lin Feng 2020: King's Super Cup 1st Group Stage. He lost to Fang Feida by TKO in the first round. He fought for Wu Lin Feng once again during Wu Lin Feng King's Super Cup 2nd Group Stage, against Jin Ying. He lost by a first round TKO, due to repeated left hooks. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2019 Enfusion −60kg Champion * 2018 Wu Lin Feng World −60kg Tournament Runner-up ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=95% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font-size:88%; text-align:center;" |- !
